name: Green Inferno
description: Big inspiration from E4M1 "Hell Beneath". This map is symmetrical, linear and has copy/paste details, but I guess it's playable at least. I was suppose to release this map into my Ultimate Doom megawad, but I decided to release this individually. Although I'm probably going to add this to my megawad either way, but that megawad is going to take me for about 10-20 years at least to make it.
